script:
#!/bin/bash #check install log for package errors
logfile="/var/log/anaconda/anaconda.packaging.log" errors=`grep "scriptlet failed" $logfile`
# hopefully https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1035745 will # be fixed and we can provide more informative install errors in the future
if [ -n "$errors" ]; then echo -e "Scriptlet failed errors found in $logfile:\n\n$errors" >&2 exit 1 fi
